last_episode_to_air.name: The Elephant’s Mirror
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Elephant's tantrum helps him to get what he wants

name: Mig Said Series: Can We Be Friends
original_name: Mig Said Series: Can We Be Friends
overview: Mig Said is a beautiful animated collection of poetic ales about discovering the world. Asking and answering questions like “What can a white bear have in common with a black bear?” and “Do we only make friends with people similar to ourselves?”
